Text:
Hi MusicProAppz,  You have two identical Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2010 with Service Pack 1 torrents, except for the sizes.  One is larger than the other.

Can you tell what the differences are? 
Thank you
I see this torrent has the Office 2010 Toolkit included. Can anyone confirm this activation method working as of recently? I'll make a post when I'm done installing.

Alrighty, here is how it went!

-Disconnect Internet
-Mount ISO
 =Install Successful
-Run Office Toolkit 2010
 =Choose EZ Activator
 ==Success 100% Activated!
-Unmount ISO
-Reconnect Internet
 =Win.


INFO:
Don't know why MusicProAppz didn't label the torrent name with a x64. Yes, this is the 64bit version with SP1. It works fine.
--------------------------------------------
Malware Byte is saying the KMS Service is a theat. It also shows the Office Tool Kit as a hack tool but that is fine. I had no problems with this torrent aside from the KMS Service. Maybe someone can confirm the service is not a threat? 

Good luck!
Good torrent, Though i am a bit puzzled by the 2 warnings, that AVG issued, when using the toolbox.
How do you start the EZ Activator?

If Office has to 'Configure' every time you run it, do this:

Start > Programs > Accessories > Command Prompt (right-click and 'Run as administrator')

Copy and paste the following line:
secedit /configure /cfg %windir%\inf\defltbase.inf /db defltbase.sdb /verbose

Close and reboot PC.
do you need a key for this to work
